price: 13. Nous en avons alors fait une goutte de sperme placée dans un réceptacle sûr.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
